body_html: Looks good. I would prefer keeping the include order such that the related header file for C++ modules is the first include. This seems to be common practice (including the Facebook and Google C++ style guides) and has the benefit that you're more likely to detect cases where the header file is not separable compilable.

body: Looks good. I would prefer keeping the include order such that the related header file for C++ modules is the first include. This seems to be common practice (including the Facebook and Google C++ style guides) and has the benefit that you're more likely to detect cases where the header file is not separable compilable.
